daily_plan_req: 1. Wake up and complete morning routine at 6:00 am 2. Attend classes at Oak Hill College from 10:00 am to 2:00 pm 3. Explore the village history and culture with Isabella at 9:00 am 4. Attend Isabella's birthday celebration at Hobbs Cafe at 5:00 pm
name: Ayesha Khan
learned: Ayesha Khan is a college student who loves to explore literature. She is curious and determined to understand the nuances of each work.
currently: Status: Ayesha Khan spent Tuesday February 14 immersing herself in the village's history and culture. She met Isabella at Hobbs Cafe at 9 am for their village exploration and attended Isabella's birthday celebration at Hobbs Cafe at 5 pm. She also visited the local library, attended the music event, and explored the art gallery with Eddy. Ayesha enjoyed learning more about the community and looks forward to continuing her adventures and connections in the village.
lifestyle: Ayesha Khan goes to bed around 10pm, awakes up around 6am, eats dinner around 5pm.
